name: Personal Laws (Amendment) Act, 2019
1: 1. (1) This Act may be called the Personal Laws (Amendment) Act, 2019.(2) It shall come into force on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
2: 2. In the Divorce Act, 1869, in section 10, in sub-section (1), clause (iv) shall be omitted.
3: 3. In the Dissolution of Muslim Marriages Act, 1939, in section 2, in ground (vi), the words "leprosy or" shall be omitted.
4: 4. In the Special Marriage Act, 1954, in section 27, in sub-section (1), clause (g) shall be omitted.
5: 5. In the Hindu Marriage Act, 1955, in section 13, in sub-section (1), clause (iv) shall be omitted.
6: 6. In the Hindu Adoptions and Maintenance Act, 1956 in section 18, in sub-section (2), clause (c) shall be omitted.
